org.jerkar.api.java.project

Class JkProjectSourceLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.java.project.JkProjectSourceLayout

  • public class JkProjectSourceLayout
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a project layout about the source parts. Generated sources/resources are not considered as source part since it is generated (so part of the output).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.nio.file.PathMatcher JAVA_RESOURCE_MATCHER
      Filter to consider as resources everything but java source stuff.

    • Field Detail

      • JAVA_RESOURCE_MATCHER

        public static final java.nio.file.PathMatcher JAVA_RESOURCE_MATCHER
        Filter to consider as resources everything but java source stuff.

    • Method Detail

      • ofMavenStyle

        public static JkProjectSourceLayout ofMavenStyle()
        Creates a Java project source structure according Maven conventions. It differs from Maven in that non-java files located under src/main/java and src/test/java are also considered as resources.

      • ofSimpleStyle

        public static JkProjectSourceLayout ofSimpleStyle()
        Creates a simple Java project structure. Production sources and resources are located under src. Test sources and resources are located in test.

      • withBaseDir

        public JkProjectSourceLayout withBaseDir(java.nio.file.Path newBaseDir)
        Re-localise all locations defined under the base directory to the specified new of directory keeping the same relative path.
